interface.name: EventFilter
interface.javadoc: Enumeration for possible values for acceptEvent(AWTEvent ev) method. EventDispatchThread#pumpEventsForFilters(EventFilter)

ACCEPT_IMMEDIATELY means that this filter do not filter the event, no other filters are queried and to proceed it, and it is dispatched by the EventDispatchThread It is not recommended to use ACCEPT_IMMEDIATELY as there may be some active filters not queried yet that do not accept this event. It is primarily used by modal filters. EventDispatchThread#pumpEventsForFilters(EventFilter) ModalEventFilter
